name: Plugging Into Pleasure: NFT#2
description: Is an early datamoshing work created in 2007. The glitch was found by accident while downloading pornography, in particular WMV files. Clicking rapidly would make the pixels flow across the screen obfuscating the intended images of pleasure for new images of pleasure. Perhaps videos true nature, that lives under all of our encoded images. All we need to do is listen.
